Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Golden Dolphin Way, north of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see a number of small houses used by the farmers and their families. Since the regular houses are so far away from the farms, the farmer's federation demanded that special houses be provided for the farmers. This would increase productivity and make everyone's lives much better. And so it was done because the farmer's lobby is one of the largest political lobby groups in the city, and holds more power than even the government.
